io.deepstream

Interface RecordChangedCallback


  • public interface RecordChangedCallback
    Record data changed listener, used to be notified whenever the record data has been modified either locally or remotely.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRecordChanged(java.lang.String recordName, com.google.gson.JsonElement data)
      Called when the listener is added via Record.subscribe(RecordChangedCallback, boolean)
      Will contain the entire record data, regardless of whether triggered by a Patch or Update
      void onRecordChanged(java.lang.String recordName, java.lang.String path, java.lang.Object data)
      TODO: Bite the bullet and do it as JsonElement? Called when the listener is added via Record.subscribe(String, RecordChangedCallback, boolean)
      Will contain the data under the path, regardless of whether triggered by a Patch or Update

    • Method Detail

      • onRecordChanged

        void onRecordChanged(java.lang.String recordName,
                   com.google.gson.JsonElement data)
        Called when the listener is added via Record.subscribe(RecordChangedCallback, boolean)
        Will contain the entire record data, regardless of whether triggered by a Patch or Update
        Parameters:
        recordName - The name of the record change
        data - The entire data as a JsonElement, can be retrieved via JsonElement.getAsJsonObject()

      • onRecordChanged

        void onRecordChanged(java.lang.String recordName,
                   java.lang.String path,
                   java.lang.Object data)
        TODO: Bite the bullet and do it as JsonElement? Called when the listener is added via Record.subscribe(String, RecordChangedCallback, boolean)
        Will contain the data under the path, regardless of whether triggered by a Patch or Update
        Parameters:
        recordName - The name of the record change
        path - The path subscribed to
        data - The data under the path as an Object
